biometric_consent.body:
Stripe will confirm your identity using biometric technology that uses images of you and your identification, and other data sources. The results will be shared with Rocket Rides.

[Learn how Stripe Identity works](https://verify.stripe.com)
biometric_consent.title: How Stripe will verify your identity

success.body: Thank you for providing your information. Rocket Rides will reach out if additional details are required.
success.title: Verification submitted

welcome.body:
Data will be stored and may be used according to Stripe [Privacy Policy](https://verify.stripe.com) and the Rocket Rides Privacy Policy. [Learn more](https://verify.stripe.com).

Please have a form of identification ready, and be prepared to take a selfie.
welcome.title: Rocket Rides partners with Stripe for secure identity verification
